definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Which had been searching the Barents Sea for weeks, was on its way home.
sentences.chinese: 在巴倫支海搜尋了幾個星期之後，正在返航途中。

sentences.english: A sea battle was fought in the Barents Sea between German and British fleets .
sentences.chinese: 德國與英國皇家海軍艦隊在巴倫支海發生戰鬥。

sentences.english: The small ship, Elkor, which had been searching the Barents Sea for weeks.
sentences.chinese: 小船“埃爾科”號在巴倫支海搜尋了幾個星期之後。

sentences.english: It splits the disputed part of the Barents Sea into two equally sized areas.
sentences.chinese: 依據協議，巴倫支海爭議海域一分爲二。

sentences.english: It will allow significant exploration of the region for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 在巴倫支海，如此重大的勘探是史無前例的。

sentences.english: Gunner had no qualms about Reno's mission of spying on Soviet submarine maneuvers in the Barents Sea.
sentences.chinese: 剛納對到巴倫支海執行監視任務並不擔心。
